experiences.title: Spa Day on Venus
experiences.description: Relax in a geothermal spa on the planet’s scorched surface, protected by advanced thermal shielding.

experiences.title: Skiing Down Olympus Mons
experiences.description: Descend the tallest volcano in the solar system on a thrilling low-gravity ski adventure.

experiences.title: Deep-Sea Dive on Enceladus
experiences.description: Explore the icy moon’s mysterious underwater oceans filled with alien bioluminescent life.

experiences.title: Aurora Balloon Cruise Over Jupiter
experiences.description: Float safely above Jupiter’s breathtaking storms and witness auroras larger than Earth itself.

experiences.title: Crystal Cavern Expedition on Europa
experiences.description: Journey through vast crystalline caves beneath Europa’s frozen crust, illuminated by internal glacial light.

experiences.title: Stargazer Retreat on the Lunar Far Side
experiences.description: Unwind at a serene observatory resort located on the Moon’s radio‑silent far side, perfect for astronomy lovers.
